::Killfest/EndBringer/Scyther/Greven/Demise/Darkmouse::

Killfest emerges from the bushes, the wounds on his body from the 
battle making his giant frame look even more impressive. He looks 
down at Darkfate and DrillBit as he approaches them.

"My group was followed. We had to pause to take care of the 
attackers," he looks around, "What's the situation? And who are you?" 
The second question was directed at Scorponok.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer walks up behind Killfest, standing a foot taller, and 
being much more insane-looking, than his commander.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scyther lands near Killfest, uncloaking and putting Darkmouse down. 
Darkmouse runs over to DrillBit.

"What happened to the base???" She asks excitingly.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Greven and Demise walk up behind Killfest and EndBringer, looking at 
the small bots in the area uncertainly. They wern't used to being 
around bots that were less than 10 feet tall, as most of these were.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  With the destruction of War's spark a hidden protocol in the 
hidden ship 
> turned on. It had been dl'd into Drill Bit's mind by War. It was a 
secret 
> comm hidden in the bots brain. It turned on. "Drill Bit.... this 
message 
> comes with sorrow. If you are hearing this I am dead and so is the 
council 
> base. But hope still lives. The base destructor came in is still 
here! he 
> only hid it from his enemies with a flashy light show and a fancy 
cloak 
> device. Unfortunatly it's defences can only be put on-line by his 
hand. But I 
> have a solution to that. I dl'd something in the computers after 
his death. 
> Here are the coordinates of the base. Grid 7-5 alpha. All you have 
to do is 
> copy destructor's voice wich I have dl'd into this comm. You will 
find it 
> helpful it will decloak the base and open the main door. Go to the 
main 
> computer counsol and hit the green button. That will solve the 
defence 
> problem. I wish you good luck. And long live the predacon empire!"
